casebody.data:
STATE
v.
LITTLE. No. COA06-289. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed March 6, 2007. Certification March 26, 2007. Appeal from the Moore (02CRS52609, 02CRS52610, 02CRS52611, 02CRS52612).

Case reported without published opinion. No error; remanded for an evidentiary hearing on Defendant's Motion for Appropriate Relief.
